thread.title: Cornerstone Christian Academy edges past Bobcats
thread.title_full: Cornerstone Christian Academy edges past Bobcats

author: Trail-Gazette staff
title: Cornerstone Christian Academy edges past Bobcats
text: Cornerstone Christian Academy edges past Bobcats Trail-Gazette staff Posted: 10/05/2015 08:41:42 AM MDT Estes Park junior Evan Tasker runs the ball during the Bobcats' Sept. 25 game against Resurrection Christian. (Debbie Holmes / Trail-Gazette) The Estes Park High School football team battled it out with the Cornerstone Christian Academy Bulldogs Saturday afternoon. But the Bulldogs walked away victorious, winning 36-24. The Bobcats led 12-8 following one quarter play and then clung to a 18-14 halftime lead. The Bulldogs rallied back in the third quarter, scoring 16 unanswered points. Both teams added a touchdown in the final quarter. The Bobcats will host their homecoming game 7 p.m. this Friday versus Front Range Academy at Bobcat Stadium. Advertisement
